argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dstrvprob.1 | |- ( ph -> P e. Prob ) |
| 2 |  | dstrvprob.2 | |- ( ph -> X e. ( rRndVar ` P ) ) |
| 3 |  | orvcelel.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. BrSiga ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_orrvcval4 | |- ( ph -> ( X oRVC _E A ) = ( `' X " { x e. RR | x _E A } ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_epelg | |- ( A e. BrSiga -> ( x _E A <-> x e. A ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( x _E A <-> x e. A ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_rabbidv | |- ( ph -> { x e. RR | x _E A } = { x e. RR | x e. A } ) |
| 8 |  | #P_dfin5 | |- ( RR i^i A ) = { x e. RR | x e. A } |
| 9 | 8 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( RR i^i A ) = { x e. RR | x e. A } ) |
| 10 |  | #P_elssuni | |- ( A e. BrSiga -> A C_ U. BrSiga ) |
| 11 |  | #P_unibrsiga | |- U. BrSiga = RR |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl6sseq | |- ( A e. BrSiga -> A C_ RR ) |
| 13 | 3, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) |
| 14 |  | #P_sseqin2 | |- ( A C_ RR <-> ( RR i^i A ) = A ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> ( RR i^i A ) = A ) |
| 16 | 7, 9, 15 | #P_3eqtr2d | |- ( ph -> { x e. RR | x _E A } = A ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_imaeq2d | |- ( ph -> ( `' X " { x e. RR | x _E A } ) = ( `' X " A ) ) |
| 18 | 4, 17 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( X oRVC _E A ) = ( `' X " A ) ) |
